name: T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial™ AHA + BHA Mask
about the product: A pro-quality AHA/BHA "facial" that resurfaces skin to visibly reveal greater clarity, improved skin texture and tone, and a more youthful-looking appearance.
Dark Spots, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles, and Pores
- 25% AHA Blend (glycolic + (T) tartaric, (L) lactic, (C) citric acids): Exfoliates dead surface skin cells and revs up surface turnover to smooth and brighten the appearance of skin.
- Salicylic Acid (BHA) 2%: Penetrates to exfoliate and unclog inside pores as well as on the surface of the skin, providing greater visible skin clarity while soothing redness.
- Chickpea Flour: Balances and brightens skin‘s appearance while combating visible dullness.
What Else You Need to Know:

Created with all skin in mind, Babyfacial‘s 25 percent AHA/2 percent BHA blend gently exfoliates the pore lining and resurfaces by removing dead skin cells. With an ideal pH level of 3.5, glycolic, tartaric, lactic, citric, and salicylic acids work together to ensure higher efficacy without visible redness and sensitization.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.
In an independent consumer-testing panel of 104 women ages 25 to 55:
- 94% found skin to be deeply cleansed and resurfaced
- 93% found skin texture baby-soft and smooth
- 93% found skin appeared brighter and radiant
- 92% found skin appeared to have a healthy glow and boosted clarity
- 91% felt skin appeared fresh and youthful
- 90% found skin appeared clearer and more even

The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; and until now, SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state. Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation).
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

“Tucked away on the top of a hill in central Italy is a small gem of a town called Nocera Umbra. I traveled to this picturesque village almost 18 years ago to discover their hidden secret—Umbrian clay, an ultra-fine mineral-rich clay. This unique clay has been around for centuries and was even used by the ancient Etruscans for its array of benefits. I have been impressed with its versatility and high level of effectiveness ever since my first visit. I am always excited to develop new products that deliver the clay, which I call a ‘miracle ingredient,’ in its purest form. Our newest innovation is a purifying toner which does just that. Ideal for all skin types, I use the toner to gently remove impurities while toning and balancing my skin. The refreshing formula also minimizes the appearance of my pores without drying out my skin, leaving my complexion soft and smooth. I can’t live without it!”—Lev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder

CBD at Sephora Standards
Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:
1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive.
2. Full-spectrum CBD* or broad-spectrum CBD*. No CBD isolate*.
3. Triple-tested product for potency and contaminants*
4. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) of the final formula from the manufacturer.
5. Compliant with Clean at Sephora standards.
Fine print:
-Full-spectrum CBD

: Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-Broad-spectrum CBD

: Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-CBD Isolate:
A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD.  No other compounds of the hemp plant are included.
-Testing

: Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp, the cannabinoid extract, and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals, solvents, mycotoxins, pesticides, and microbials.

about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A lightweight gel that simultaneously mattifies and hydrates for up to eight hours while minimizing the appearance of pores.
If you want to know more…
Skin has a matte finish that feels soft and hydrated for up to 8 hours, and pores look instantly smaller. With regular use, pores are less clogged and skin is less shiny.
What else you need to know:

Erase shine while keeping skin hydrated with this light, refreshing gel. It contains a smart sponge polysaccharide that's able to distinguish between sebum and water, so it pulls oil from the skin while leaving hydration levels intact. Its light-diffusing powders blur pores for a smooth, fresh finish. Long-term, botanical extracts from blue iris and willow bark purify and clean out pores while silica microsponges prevent pore walls from getting slack (one reason they look larger).
What else you need to know:

Don't trust the natural instinct to soak up oil with gobs of drying products when you have shiny skin. Stripping skin of all moisture actually revs oil production, worsening breakouts and further clogging pores.

about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
An age-reversing serum supercharged with antioxidants, natural SPF, hyaluronic acid, and Australian wildcrafted ingredients.
If you want to know more…

This youth-boosting elixir contains an abundance of Australian wildcrafted ingredients that naturally turn back the clock. Kakadu plum, edelweiss, lilli pilli (also known as ripeberry), and acerola cherry are supercharged with antioxidants to enhance visible firmness, support collagen production, and even tone, while shielding against free radical and UV damage. Hyaluronic acid—which holds 1,000 times its weight in water—plumps and hydrates skin.
What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, formulated without gluten, hypoallergenic, and cruelty-free. It is suitable for women who are pregnant and breastfeeding.

Edible: skin absorbs 60 percent of the substances that we place on it. So, what we put on our body is just as important as what we put in it. Edible Beauty Australia’s gold standard for purity is an edible ingredient list. This means they use only food-grade ingredients to create their range of therapeutic, wildcrafted, botanical skincare. Products are free of alcohol, fragrance, propylene glycol, preservatives, colors, and synthetics, and come packaged in Miron violet glass, which filters damaging UV rays while preserving and activating the botanical ingredients found inside.

Wildcrafted: the use of Australian wildcrafted botanicals raises the therapeutic profile of each and every formula. Found growing in remote and arid regions of Australia, these plants are forced to develop a strong antioxidant defense and preservation system to survive. When used topically, these qualities transfer to your skin, in the form of potent anti-aging, protective, nourishing, and hydrating benefits.
Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

-Acerola Cherry: Packed with vitamin C and antioxidants to reduce pigmentation and refine pores.

CBD at Sephora Standards
Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:
1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive.
2. Full-spectrum CBD* or broad-spectrum CBD*. No CBD isolate*.
3. Triple-tested product for potency and contaminants*
4. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) of the final formula from the manufacturer.
5. Compliant with Clean at Sephora standards.
Fine print:
-Full-spectrum CBD

: Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-Broad-spectrum CBD

: Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-CBD Isolate:
A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD.  No other compounds of the hemp plant are included.
-Testing

: Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp, the cannabinoid extract, and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals, solvents, mycotoxins, pesticides, and microbials.

about the product: A concentrated serum that fights visible signs of aging and supercharges your skin for a pore-less, bouncy appearance.
Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity

- Pitera™: A bio-ingredient derived from yeast fermentation that resembles your skin's natural moisturizing factors; contains over 50 micronutrients like vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and acids to condition skin's natural functions.

- InfinitPower Technology: An exclusive cocktail of power ingredients formulated with calla lily extract, dokudami extract, and peony extract to charge the power source of skin to visibly plump up from within.
What Else You Need to Know:

With a specially designed auto-dropper, just one powerful drop is the optimal dosage for each application. The concentrated formula with InfinitPower Technology visibly plumps skin from within, restoring visible bounciness and suppleness.

The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.

name: ESPADA Blue Light Acne Treatment
about the product: A device that uses the dual power of laser-focused blue LED light and T-Sonic pulsations to address acne-causing bacteria, painlessly, in as little as 30 seconds.
What Else You Need to Know:

The ultra-hygienic silicone surface inhibits bacterial growth. The blue LED light activates when the device touches the skin to address bacteria. T-Sonic pulsations support natural blood microcirculation to facilitate the skin’s renewal. Red, cross-shaped light precisely targets blemishes. ESPADA is FDA-approved.
ingredients: Suggested Usage:
-Cleanse your face to remove all dirt and makeup. ESPADA’s blue light is most effective on clean, unblocked skin.
-Press the center button once to activate the device, and point it over the blemish using the targeting red light. The blue light will activate upon contact with the skin.
-Hold the ESPADA on the blemish for 30 seconds, at which point it will pulse to let you know it’s completed.
-Built-in timer pauses pulse once every 30 seconds to indicate the end of one blemish-treating routine.
-For mild acne, apply two 30-second routines.
-For more moderate acne, three to four routines are recommended.
Precautions:
-The skin may feel warm during treatment, which is not any cause for concern.
-The skin may develop a slight redness that fades within 24 hours.
-If the skin develops a slight discoloration that lasts for more than 24 hours, discontinue use.

name: Vinopure Natural Salicylic Acid Pore Minimizing Toner
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A pore-diminishing toner powered by 100 percent natural salicylic acid to control oil and diminish the appearance of future blackheads and breakouts.
If you want to know more…

Purge pores of blackheads and excess oil with this purifying toner. It acts like a vacuum for your pores, ensuring your skin is squeaky clean without drying it out. Caudalie’s natural salicylic acid (a BHA, or beta hydroxy acid) is clean, powerful, and oil soluble, which allows it to penetrate pores, targeting the most stubborn pimples caused by bacteria and dead skin. Not only will the natural salicylic acid unclog oil that’s trapped inside pores, but it will also act as an exfoliator to slough away dead skin cells and smooth the look of skin’s overall texture. Rest assured, this powerful formula is non-irritating and safe for sensitive skin, thanks to grape water and rosewater, which soothe irritation and enhance your glow. The formula is further enriched with antioxidant grape seed polyphenols that prevent oil from oxidizing, or turning black. Lastly, a complex of antibacterial, fragrance-free and noncomedogenic essential oils deliver purifying, clarifying, and calming benefits to the skin. Best for oily to combination skin or those with hormonal breakouts, this toner diminishes the appearance of pores, smooth the look of skin texture, enhance skin clarity, and control oil production. The formula is vegan and 100 percent fragrance-free, with a scent that comes from natural essential oils.
In a clinical self-evaluation test of 30 volunteers, with twice daily application:
Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
Your purchase helps the planet. Caudalie donates 1% of sales to plant trees. Merci!
ingredients: -Natural Salicylic Acid (derived from Wintergreen): Decongests and tightens the look of clogged pores, draws out excess oil and bacteria, refines the look of skin texture.

name: U.F.O. Ultra-Clarifying Face Oil
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A quick-absorbing, medicated dry oil to clear congested pores, treat and prevent acne, and smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for clearer, smoother skin.
If you want to know more…

With 1.5 percent salicylic acid, this fast-acting, quick-drying, medicated oil clears acne and blackhead-causing buildup and debris from congested pores for smoother, blemish-free skin. Tea tree oil and black cumin seed oil support clear skin, while hexylresorcinol and licorice naturally brighten the appearance of old acne discolorations for a more even-toned complexion.

Counterbalancing the potentially drying effects of salicylic acid, milk thistle and cucumber seed oil nourish the skin and smooth the appearance of lines and wrinkles, without leaving a greasy residue. Chamomile and neroli soothe stressed, blemish-prone skin.
What else you need to know:

"When I formulated U.F.O., I wanted to create a dry oil that practically disappears into the skin, leaving oily skin smooth (but never greasy) and yet effectively treated for blemishes and blackheads. Salicylic acid is notoriously over-drying, leaving your skin stripped and looking irritated. By infusing salicylic acid into clarifying oils (like tea tree oil and black cumin seed oil), the drying effects of salicylic acid are nipped in the bud, while all of the treatment aspects (like clearing congested pores and managing blackheads and blemishes) are in full-force. U.F.O. is part of the new Green Line, along with Martian Mattiyfing Melting Water-Gel Toner, created specifically for oily skin clients."—Sunday Riley

-Tea Tree Oil and Black Cumin Seed Oil: Help purify the skin and supports clarity.			
-Licorice Root and Hexylresorcinol: Naturally brighten the appearance of dark spots.

Niacinamide, also known as vitamin B3, is a well-studied, multifaceted active ingredient that is renowned for its multiple benefits on the skin.

In its truest form, Niacinamide is readily water soluble and dissolves in water-based products, such as serums and creams, with ease. The Ordinary’s 100% Niacinamide Powder can be mixed into any non-conflicting, water-based treatment provided that the pH of the base is between 5.1 and 7.0. When it comes to the choice of a water-based base to mix with this formula, there are several options available within The Ordinary brand. A blend of oils and vitamin F balances the skin’s healthy barrier, polyphenols and platinum peptides strengthen the skin, and a chronopeptide mimics vitamin D’s antioxidant benefits.
This serum is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Uniquely formulated with anti-aging superstars retinol and vitamin C, this silky, weightless face serum acts like an incredibly rejuvenating power nap to refresh dull, tired skin while you sleep. The ultimate power couple, retinol supports the look of firmness and texture while it smooths lines and wrinkles, and L-ascorbic acid—the purest form of vitamin C—helps dramatically brighten and even skin tone. Added plant extracts and antioxidants help neutralize free radicals that can contribute to premature aging.
What else you need to know:

Soothing plant extracts, antioxidants, and two forms of hydrating hyaluronic acid were added to help offset dryness commonly triggered by retinol. If you’re new to this powerhouse anti-aging ingredient, start by using +Retinol Vita C Power Serum only three times a week. Once skin has adjusted, use it every other night, slowly working up to nightly use. Layer under moisturizer if dryness is a seasonal or primary skincare concern.
Kate Somerville has been certified cruelty-free by PETA, solidifying the brand’s commitment to never test their products or ingredients on animals.
In an independent clinical study, after just 1 week:
- 94% showed highly significant improvement in the look of fine lines and wrinkles
- 93% saw improvement in the look of skin elasticity
- 90% said their skin tone looked brighter
- 90% said their skin looked more luminous

name: Volcanic Elixir Polynesian Beauty Oil
about the product: A hydrating overnight treatment oil to nourish and condition skin, with a powerful key ingredient extracted from the nut kernels of the tamanu fruit.

When used as an overnight hydration treatment, Volcanic Elixir works while you sleep. It delivers rich hydration, conditions damaged skin, soothes acne-prone skin, and helps improve the look of the overall skin complexion.

This elixir is rich in antioxidant and skin-calming properties, making it ideal for conditioning dry skin and eczema. The naturally earthy aroma of the tamanu oil explodes in the Volcanic Elixir as it's unmasked by filler ingredients or artificial fragrances. It's 100-percent real, raw, and natural.

This Polynesian beauty oil is extracted from the nut kernels of the tamanu fruit—which flourishes in the islands of the South Pacific, thanks to the volcanic atmosphere there. Not only does volcanic ash provide nutrients to surrounding soil, but it also contains minerals that are beneficial to plants. Due to this very reason, the tamanu oil originating from Polynesia contains the highest nutritional value.
Volcanic Elixir can also be used on the face or body as a daily moisturizer.
What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free.

CBD at Sephora Standards
Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:
1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive.

Fine print:
-Full-spectrum CBD

: Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product, which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-Broad-spectrum CBD

: Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-CBD Isolate:
A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD. No other compounds of the hemp plant are included.
-Testing

: Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp, the cannabinoid extract, and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals, solvents, mycotoxins, pesticides, and microbials.

name: Double-Ended Blemish Extractor
about the product: A long-handled, stainless steel, double loop extractor.
This tool features a small loop for white heads and a flat side to extract blackheads.
What else you need to know:

A deep, cystic pimple should not be opened with a loop extractor. When dealing with deep acne, it's best to visit a dermatologist. A doctor may use a sterile needle, but only after a pustule has formed. Additional treatments depend on the severity of the acne.
What else you need to know:
This product was not tested on animals.
ingredients: Suggested Usage:
Prior to using the Double Ended Blemish Extractor, steaming the face, or using a hot water compress is strongly recommended to help soften comedones.
-This will make them much easier to remove.
-When you're ready to begin the extraction process lay the preferred side on top of the blemish - basically encircling this area with the loop.
-Apply slow and even pressure lightly until the trapped sebum is forced out of the follicle.
-Do not continue to attempt the extraction if the trapped sebum is not released easily.
-Applying too much force can cause infection and scarring.
-Use the small loop for whiteheads and the flat side for blackheads.

CBD at Sephora Standards 
Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:
1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive.
2. Full-spectrum CBD* or broad-spectrum CBD*. No CBD isolate*.
3. Triple-tested product for potency and contaminants*
4. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) of the final formula from the manufacturer.
5. Compliant with Clean at Sephora standards.
Fine print:
-Full-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-Broad-spectrum CBD:

Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-CBD Isolate:
A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD.  No other compounds of the hemp plant are included.
-Testing:

Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp, the cannabinoid extract, and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals, solvents, mycotoxins, pesticides, and microbials.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.

name: Rapid Collagen Infusion
about the product:
What it is:

An antiaging treatment that targets the appearance of wrinkles and loss of resilience by rapidly visibly revolumizing skin and infusing skin’s surface with collagen amino acids. 

What it is formulated to do:

 Rapid Collagen Infusion® reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. This fast-acting formula infuses skin’s surface with collagen amino acids and promotes optimal hydration. This helps to fight wrinkles and loss of resilience for a more youthful appearance. Hyaluronic Acid and an antiaging peptide help boosts skin’s resilience and plump dehydrated skin to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, while winged kelp smooths skin for a more youthful texture. Cellular hydro-lock plumps the look of skin and helps smooth surface fine lines and wrinkles. Rapid Collagen Infusion is recommended as a step two treatment in any Murad regimen and pairs perfectly with any exfoliating treatment or serum.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:

- Parabens
- Sulfates 
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:

This product is dermatologist developed and tested on people, not animals.
ingredients:

-Winged Kelp: Supports natural collagen and elastin, improves hydration levels, and increases skin suppleness.

-Cellular Hydro-Lock: Naturally increases cellular water level and relieves dry, irritated skin.

An advanced and luxurious serum with eight times more concentrated Pitera™ for firmer, more radiant skin in as few as three days.

LXP Ultimate Revival Serum is a rich, velvety facial serum that contains SK-II’s most concentrated Pitera to-date to support skin’s elasticity and radiance, and diminish visible signs of aging in as few as three days. With a unique blend of skin-conditioning agents and vitamins, this exquisite formula helps smooth the look of skin, refine texture, support skin firmness, diminish the look of uneven skin tone, and reduce wrinkle appearance for beautiful, youthful-looking skin.

This advanced face serum is made with Skin Regenerating Activ™ technology and rose absolute, both of which help support skin’s natural resilience and deliver rich moisturization. Skin is left younger-looking, with a healthy, luminous glow. The luxurious rose scent, sourced from the fields of Grasse, France, imparts a relaxing sensorial experience.

This exclusive formula—with eight times more concentrated Pitera than other SK-II products—helps to hydrate, enhance skin tone, support firmness, and provide a stunning radiance. With a rich, luxurious texture designed for maximum efficacy, this is SK-II’s most powerful serum.
What else you need to know:

The LXP Ultimate Revival Boutique is SK-II’s most luxurious and powerful collection yet. It delivers the ultimate in skin transformation in as few as three days. Enriched with the highest concentration of Pitera, this exclusive luxury skin care line offers a blend of superior technology and efficacy. Skin Regenerating Activ technology is combined with ingredients known for their traditional healing and beautifying powers, including centella essence, rose absolute, and lychee extract, to help perfect the skin. With rich formulas that provide velvety smoothness, taut firmness, radiant luminosity, and that support skin’s natural moisture, the LXP Ultimate Revival Boutique collection is SK-II’s most indulgent product line to-date.

name: Big Chill™ Stress Management Supplement
about the product: A supplement that helps the body more effectively respond to stress.
What Else You Need to Know:

It is well established that chronic stress releases hormones known to accelerate aging, cause breakouts, and negatively impact our overall health. Formulated with 500 mg of rhodiola, this supplement is designed to improve your body’s response to stress. Now, take a deep breath, let the little stresses of life roll off your back, and smile easy*.

Rhodiola is a powerful root that is often referred to as an adaptogen because of its ability to interact with hormones. Specifically, it impacts the stress hormone cortisol, helping improve mental focus and calming the body. In addition to stabilizing stress levels, rhodiola can help the body more easily adapt to physical and environmental strains, preventing fatigue and increasing productivity.

A 2012 study on the effects of rhodiola extract on mental performance under stress and fatigue found that the group who received the active ingredients had lower fatigue and performed better than those who received the placebo.
A small study at UCLA conducted in 2008 found that those who took the herb for 10 weeks observed a significant improvement in their anxiety levels.
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
ingredients: -Rhodiola Rosea: Supports adrenal balance to help the body deal with stress.

name: Revitalixir™ Recovery Serum
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A face and eye serum that addresses stress-induced aging and instantly revives for a quick pick-me-up.
If you want to know more…

This sphere-infused serum for the face and eyes smooths stress lines, reduces under-eye puffiness and dark circles, and renews vibrancy immediately and over time. A skin-relaxing blend of neuropeptide, paracress, and cannabis helps smooth while boosting softness and moisture. Niacinamide refines texture, wild indigo visibly reduces under-eye dark circles, and caffeine re-invigorates tone while minimizing under-eye puffiness.
What else you need to know:

Did you know a high stress lifestyle makes you look up to three-and-a-half years older?* While there are many products for aging, the visible damaging effects of stress have largely been ignored. Murad has combined top-performing relaxing and reviving ingredients to target the visible premature aging effects of stress. *Based on a clinical study that measured cortisol and its effects on perceived age.

This product is cruelty-free, noncomedogenic, and free of gluten, alcohol, and animal-derived ingredients. The sphere relaxes the visible signs of stress on skin with softening, moisturizing cannabis, smoothing paracress extract, and hydrating hyaluronic acid. The outer gel Revives and renews vibrancy with redness-reducing wild indigo, smoothing neuropeptide, re-invigorating and toning caffeine, and refining niacinamide.

"Cultural Stress™ is the unnecessary man-made stress we put on ourselves in our attempt to live up to everyone’s expectations. Our hyper-connected, fast-paced society triggers a constant flood of damaging stress hormones, like cortisol, that fatigue our bodies and could show in our skin as dehydration, sallowness, roughness, and deep expression lines. The best way to manage stress is through balance, and I formulated Revitalixir™ Recovery Serum with a balancing blend of relaxing and reviving extracts to help manage the visible effects of stress, minimize skin fatigue, and renew vibrancy in an instant and over time."—Howard Murad, M.D., FAAD
Clinically tested by an independent laboratory and proven safe for sensitive skin.

name: Protein Booster Skin Serum
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
An advanced anti-aging serum that offers a daily-dose of anti-aging defense.
If you want to know more…

This multifunctional anti-aging serum offers a daily-dose of anti-aging defense. The silky liquid texture is readily absorbed allowing for immediate delivery of the efficacious ingredients. Serums are intended to be used with a moisturizer or blended with another product. It is the ideal companion to any of our moisturizers (Double-Duty Face Moisturizer SPF 20, Clean Break Oil-Free Moisturizer, Dry Erase Ultra-Calming Face Cream, or Line Smoother 8% Glycolic Acid Treatment) or Post Shave Cooling Gel. Except for customers with oily skin, serums are not intended to provide adequate hydration when used alone.

Peptides are chains of amino acids (the building blocks of protein) that are essential to human life. They function as messengers in the skin, allowing the epidermis and dermis to communicate more efficiently. As we age, communication diminishes within the skin resulting in fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of elasticity. Peptides improve cell communication by sending specific signals that affect skin's response.
What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and formulated without fragrance and colorant.

Dr Lancer’s powerful solution for dull, stressed skin is formulated with 10 percent glycolic acid and caviar lime, a precious Australian fruit naturally rich in AHAs. This AHA blend works together with 10 percent brightening phytic acid to help resurface and remove dulling surface cells, improving the look of pores and skin tone. Skin appears smoother, softer, and even with a youthful-looking glow.
What else you need to know:

Using his unrivaled clinical experience, Dr. Lancer worked to develop a line of technologically advanced, active ingredient-focused products designed to improve the overall health and appearance of skin, while also giving patients the sought-after ‘Lancer Glow.’

By devising a system that supports this process through manual exfoliation, Dr. Lancer was able to create a unique anti-aging line that delivers beautiful, glowing results to all skin types. The three steps of The Lancer Method dramatically improve the appearance of fine lines, texture, discoloration, and pore size. All of the Lancer skincare treatments are formulated for optimum efficacy and luminous results.

name: Vinopure Natural Oil Control Moisturizer
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A mattifying yet hydrating moisturizer that traps oil and blackheads while addressing existing blemishes.
If you want to know more…

The rule of thumb when you break out or have oily skin is don’t stop moisturizing. If you use the right moisturizer, it will leave your skin looking matte and less oily for longer, as well as provide other long-term skin benefits. Protect your skin from coming into contact with bacteria with this mattifying moisturizer. Caudalie’s complex of noncomedogenic essential oils provide antiseptic benefits to calm the skin and keep it clear, while cleansing pores of oil, blackheads, and bacteria. Not only will the moisturizer unclog oil that’s trapped inside pores, but it will also act as an exfoliator to slough away dead skin cells and smooth the look of overall texture. Rosewater enhances your overall glow, while providing long term hydration, without shine. Thanks to the natural silica powders, skin is left matte throughout the day. This product is vegan.
In a clinical self-evaluation test of 34 volunteers, applying the product twice daily, after 2 months:
- 36% reduction in sebum production was observed
- 41% reduction in the number of blemishes was observed
